dc_title_s: Map of the city of New York showing the sewers & drains.
dc_description_s: Shows public and private sewers and streets. "C. Currier's Lith. 33 Spruce St. N.Y." Inset: northern tip of Manhattan. 1 map on 2 sheets: mounted on cloth; 48 x 161 cm, sheets 56 x 87 cm and 49 x 81 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
